<!-- This issue tracker is only for technical issues related to Bitcoin Core.

<!-- Describe the issue -->

As a developer for lightning apps there are times when bitcoind is running and generating blocks.  It is required to send coins to the lightning wallet first.  It would be a nice feature similar to btcd to allow setting the mining reward address when generating blocks.

<!--- What behavior did you expect? -->

17

OSX

title: Add ability to specify mining reward in regtest mode
